setDeleted

public static void setDeleted(OAObject oaObj,
                              boolean tf)
Used to know if an object has been deleted, by calling OAObject.delete(). This will send message, and remove oaObj from any other Hubs.

Parameters:
oaObj -
tf -

delete

public static void delete(OAObject oaObj,
                          OACascade cascade)

canDelete

public static boolean canDelete(OAObject oaObj)
Checks to see if an Object can be deleted. Checks that all child links that have mustBeEmpty are empty. NOTE: this is not called/used when deleteing an OAObject

getMustBeEmptyBeforeDelete

public static OALinkInfo[] getMustBeEmptyBeforeDelete(OAObject oaObj)
